Package com.github.rumsfield.konquest.api.event

package com.github.rumsfield.konquest.api.event
The event package includes events that can be handled just like Bukkit events.

For example: 

 
 public class MyExampleListener implements Listener {
        
     public MyExampleListener() {}
        
     @EventHandler()
     public void onExampleEvent(KonquestEvent event) {
         // do something
     }
 }

    KonquestEvent
